desc:
３ターンの間、味方単体の攻撃力を
２倍にする

dictionary.lore: A potion distributed by the Akras Summoners’ Hall. A potion that doubles the strength of any who take it for a limited period of time. It causes severe hallucinations in regular people, however, and its use among the general public is strictly prohibited. As side effects have yet to be detected in summoned Units, the Akras Summoners’ Hall limits its distribution to Summoners only.

name: 強撃薬
